message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, given the value of the product to me, I am only able to offer $850,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need a bit more to make this work. How about we split the difference and go with $900,000? It's a fair price for both of us, and it allows us to finalize this deal.

Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your efforts to meet in the middle. However, given my budget constraints, I can't go beyond $875,000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
